generic.label: Using Automation to Boost Productivity in the Workplace

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Retrieve a channel

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a channel

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many channels

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a channel

options.name: Upload Banner
options.description: Upload a channel banner

properties.name: part
properties.description: The fields parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more channel resource properties that the API response will include

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: The categoryId parameter specifies a YouTube guide category, thereby requesting YouTube channels associated with that category

options.name: categoryId
options.description: The categoryId parameter specifies a YouTube guide category, thereby requesting YouTube channels associated with that category

options.name: forUsername
options.description: The forUsername parameter specifies a YouTube username, thereby requesting the channel associated with that username

options.name: id
options.description: The ID parameter specifies a comma-separated list of the YouTube channel ID(s) for the resource(s) that are being retrieved. In a channel resource, the ID property specifies the channel's YouTube channel ID.

options.name: managedByMe
options.description: Whether to instruct the API to only return channels managed by the content owner that the onBehalfOfContentOwner parameter specifies

properties.name: options
properties.description: The hl parameter instructs the API to retrieve localized resource metadata for a specific application language that the YouTube website supports. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: h1
options.description: The hl parameter instructs the API to retrieve localized resource metadata for a specific application language that the YouTube website supports. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: onBehalfOfContentOwner
options.description: The onBehalfOfContentOwner parameter indicates that the request's authorization credentials identify a YouTube CMS user who is acting on behalf of the content owner specified in the parameter value

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: ID of the channel

properties.name: part
properties.description: The fields parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more channel resource properties that the API response will include

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Encapsulates information about the branding of the channel

options.name: brandingSettingsUi
options.description: Encapsulates information about the branding of the channel

values.name: channel
values.description: The country with which the channel is associated. Update this property to set the value of the snippet.country property.

options.name: country
options.description: The country with which the channel is associated. Update this property to set the value of the snippet.country property.

options.name: description
options.description: The channel description, which appears in the channel information box on your channel page. The property's value has a maximum length of 1000 characters.

options.name: defaultLanguage
options.description: The content tab that users should display by default when viewers arrive at your channel page

options.name: defaultTab
options.default: The content tab that users should display by default when viewers arrive at your channel page.

options.name: featuredChannelsTitle
options.description: The title that displays above the featured channels module. The title has a maximum length of 30 characters.

options.name: featuredChannelsUrls
options.description: A list of up to 100 channels that you would like to link to from the featured channels module. The property value is a list of YouTube channel ID values, each of which uniquely identifies a channel.

options.name: keywords
options.description: Keywords associated with your channel. The value is a space-separated list of strings.

options.name: moderateComments
options.description: Whether user-submitted comments left on the channel page need to be approved by the channel owner to be publicly visible

options.name: profileColor
options.description: A prominent color that complements the channel's content

options.name: showRelatedChannels
options.description: Whether YouTube should show an algorithmically generated list of related channels on your channel page

options.name: showBrowseView
options.description: Whether the channel page should display content in a browse or feed view

options.name: trackingAnalyticsAccountId
options.description: The ID for a Google Analytics account that you want to use to track and measure traffic to your channel

options.name: unsubscribedTrailer
options.description: The video that should play in the featured video module in the channel page's browse view for unsubscribed viewers

values.name: image
values.description: The image object encapsulates information about images that display on the channel's channel page or video watch pages

properties.description: ID of the channel

properties.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

options.displayName: On Behalf Of Content Owner Channel
options.name: onBehalfOfContentOwnerChannel
options.description: The onBehalfOfContentOwnerChannel parameter specifies the YouTube channel ID of the channel to which a video is being added. This parameter is required when a request specifies a value for the onBehalfOfContentOwner parameter, and it can only be used in conjunction with that parameter.

options.name: onBehalfOfContentOwner
options.description: The onBehalfOfContentOwner parameter indicates that the request's authorization credentials identify a YouTube CMS user who is acting on behalf of the content owner specified in the parameter value

properties.name: options
properties.description: The time, measured in seconds from the start of the video, when the video should stop playing

options.name: endAt
options.description: The time, measured in seconds from the start of the video, when the video should stop playing

options.name: note
options.description: A user-generated note for this item. The property value has a maximum length of 280 characters.

options.name: onBehalfOfContentOwner
options.description: The onBehalfOfContentOwner parameter indicates that the request's authorization credentials identify a YouTube CMS user who is acting on behalf of the content owner specified in the parameter value

options.name: position
options.description: The order in which the item appears in the playlist. The value uses a zero-based index, so the first item has a position of 0, the second item has a position of 1, and so forth.

options.name: startAt
options.description: The time, measured in seconds from the start of the video, when the video should start playing

options.name: forDeveloper
options.description: Whether to restrict the search to only retrieve videos uploaded via the developer's application or website

options.name: publishedAfter
options.description: The publishedAfter parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created at or after the specified time

options.name: publishedBefore

options.name: q
options.description: The q parameter specifies the query term to search for

options.name: regionCode
options.description: The regionCode parameter instructs the API to select a video chart available in the specified region. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: relatedToVideoId
options.description: The relatedToVideoId parameter retrieves a list of videos that are related to the video that the parameter value identifies

options.name: videoCategoryId
options.description: The videoCategoryId parameter identifies the video category for which the chart should be retrieved

options.name: videoSyndicated
options.description: Whether to restrict a search to only videos that can be played outside youtube.com

options.name: videoType
options.description: The videoType parameter lets you restrict a search to a particular type of videos

properties.name: options
properties.description: YouTube will filter some content from search results and, at the least, will filter content that is restricted in your locale

options.name: safeSearch
options.description: YouTube will filter some content from search results and, at the least, will filter content that is restricted in your locale

options.name: Moderate
options.description: YouTube will filter some content from search results and, at the least, will filter content that is restricted in your locale

options.name: None
options.description: YouTube will not filter the search result set

options.name: Strict
options.description: YouTube will try to exclude all restricted content from the search result set

properties.name: rating
properties.description: Records that the authenticated user disliked the video

options.description: Records that the authenticated user liked the video

options.name: None
options.description: Removes any rating that the authenticated user had previously set for the video

hints.text: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded
The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
